body_content.explanation: If a promise is unkept, the person who made it has not done what they said they would do:
examples: The Prime Minister has been criticized for numerous unkept promises made as part of the election campaign.
I wish I believed you, but I think this is going to be another one of your unkept promises.

body_content.explanation: A garden or building that is unkept has not been cared for well:
examples: There was a small, scrubby, unkept piece of lawn outside the house.
The garden had been unkept for many years,as he had not been well enough to take care of it.
